title: How to Upload Files on to Mediafire in 9 Simple Steps

steps.title: Navigate to the Mediafire site.
steps.content: Navigate to the Mediafire site. Go to www.mediafire.com .

steps.title: Click the "Sign Up" button.
steps.content: Click the "Sign Up" button. You can find it at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Choose a plan.
steps.content: Choose a plan. You can choose the basic, pro, or business plan. The basic service is free and allows you to store up to 10GB. The pro version costs $6.99 a month and will allow you to store up to 1TB worth of files. The business version costs $100 a month and will allow you to store 100TB.

steps.title: Enter your account details.
steps.content: Enter your account details. On the given fields, enter your first and last name, e-mail address, and password.

steps.title: Click the “I agree to the terms of service” box.
steps.content: Click the “I agree to the terms of service” box.

steps.title: Click Upload.
steps.content: Click Upload . A window will pop up.

steps.title: Click the Add File button.
steps.content: Click the Add File button. It's in the lower-left corner.

steps.title: Upload a file.
steps.content: Upload a file. Once you click Add File your computer will open up a window that allows you to navigate to your folders. Note that you may have to click the blue Show all files... button to navigate your files.

steps.title: Click “Begin upload.”
steps.content: Click “Begin upload.” This will begin the process.
